text: Spira Mirabilis is a 2016 Italian documentary film directed by Massimo D'Anolfi and Martina Parenti. It was selected to compete for the Golden Lion at the 73rd Venice International Film Festival. ==References== ==External links== * Category:2016 films Category:2016 documentary films Category:Italian films Category:Italian documentary films Category:Italian-language films
title: Spira Mirabilis (film)
